page.title: 13SHERDLEY SHOW
page.content: Sherdley Show is an annual event in St.Helens. It is held in Sherdley Park which a large park in Sutton. The show took place for the first time seventeen years ago and improves each year with more things to see and do. The show is on for three days with different events on each day. There are competitions to enter, side-shows, fairground, many displays given by ee.g.,keep-fit displays, morris dancing, judo displays, army assault courses, air-force, police and firemen displays. Local industries and shopkeepers have displays there. Kelly says," I went on the helter-skelter, it cost 30p then I went on the big swings which cost 40p." On the last night of the show there is a large firework display.
